Title: Reset Password
Description: As a registered user, I want to reset my password if I forget it so that I can regain access to my account securely.

Title: Login to the Site
Description: As a registered user, I want to log in using my valid credentials so that I can access my account and use the system features.

Title: Logout from the Site
Description: As a logged-in user, I want to log out of the site so that I can securely end my session and prevent unauthorized access to my account.

Title: View User Profile
Description: As a logged-in user, I want to view my profile information so that I can see my account details and update them if necessary.

Title: Edit User Profile
Description: As a logged-in user, I want to edit my profile information so that I can keep my account details up to date.

Title: Delete User Account
Description: As a logged-in user, I want to delete my account so that I can permanently remove my information from the system if I choose to do so.
